title: Income as a determinant of demand

content.prompt: Which of the following changes will most likely cause a shift of the demand curve from D1 to D2 as shown in the diagram?

choices.label: An increase in consumersâ€™ income, assuming that video games are a normal good
An increase in the price of game consoles, a complementary good
A decrease in the price of mobile games, a substitute good
A decrease in the number of buyers in the market
A decrease in the price of video games

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
